alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 2:30PM CST until January 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...A wintry mix of sleet and freezing rain is expected. Total ice accumulations of a glaze. Up to a tenth of an inch is possible is far southeast Iowa, northeast Missouri and west central Illinois. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois, southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
